```{r}
library(tidyverse)

agenda <- read_csv(here::here("data/tbl-openwashdata-conference-agenda.csv")) 

agenda_final <- agenda  |>
  select(-start_time, -end_time, -speaker_link, -affiliation_link) |>
  relocate(time) |>
  mutate(speaker = case_when(
    str_detect(speaker, "NA") == TRUE ~ " - ",
    TRUE ~ speaker
  )) |>
  mutate(affiliation = case_when(
    str_detect(affiliation, "NA") == TRUE ~ " - ",
    TRUE ~ affiliation
  ))
```

## Schedule Overview

```{r}
agenda_final |> 
    filter(day == 2) |> 
    select(-day, -speaker) |> 
    rename_with(~stringr::str_to_title(.x), everything()) |> 
    knitr::kable()
```

## Session Details

```{r}
agenda_sessions <- agenda_final |> 
  filter(day == 2) |> 
  select(-day, -speaker) |> 
  mutate(title = case_when(
    str_detect(title, "Why Claude Code") ~ "[Why Claude Code & Workflow](why-claude.qmd)",
    str_detect(title, "Claude Code setup check") ~ "[Claude Code setup check](setup-check.qmd)",
    str_detect(title, "Showcase round 1") ~ "[Showcase round 1](showcase.qmd)",
    str_detect(title, "Showcase round 2") ~ "[Showcase round 2](showcase.qmd)",
    str_detect(title, "Work session") ~ "[Work session](work-sessions.qmd)",
    TRUE ~ title
  )) |> 
  rename_with(~stringr::str_to_title(.x), everything())

knitr::kable(agenda_sessions)
```
